node.title: Thai police chief 'Joe Ferrari' charged with murder over suspect's death
node.description: A Thai police colonel known for his extravagant collection of luxury cars and famous girlfriend is charged with killing a suspected drug dealer while trying to extort him for money.
node.content:
["A Thai police colonel, dubbed \"Joe Ferrari\" for his extravagant collection of cars, and six other officers have been charged with murder for allegedly killing a suspected drug dealer while trying to extort him for money.", "Colonel\u00a0Thitisan Utthanaphon and the other officers also face charges of extortion, dereliction of duty and confining a person against their will for the August\u00a05 incident at their station, said Ittiporn Kaewtip, a spokesperson for Thailand's Attorney-General's office.", "The suspects, who also include a police major, captain and lieutenant, could face the death penalty if convicted.", "The Attorney-General must now decide whether to send the case to court, spokesperson Prayuth Petchkhun said.", "There was a public uproar when\u00a0a video of the incident, appearing\u00a0to show Colonel\u00a0Thitisan directing a deadly assault on the suspect,\u00a0was shared on social media.", "", "
Thitisan Uthanaphon was nicknamed \"Joe Ferrari\"\u00a0for his collection of luxury cars.\u00a0(Instagram:\u00a0Baitoey Pornpjee Sirisit)
", "Allegations of police brutality and corruption are widespread in Thailand, and international rights groups have called for the officers involved in the attack to be held accountable.", "Colonel\u00a0Thitisan turned himself in after a nationwide manhunt and was given the unusual opportunity to address reporters and answer their questions by telephone in a somewhat surreal news conference called by police to announce he had been taken into custody.", "He denied any part in a shakedown and insisted he was attempting to get information from the drug dealer about where he had stashed his main supply of methamphetamine.", "\"Since I've been in the police I have never been involved in corruption,\" Colonel\u00a0Thitisan said.", "\"I did not have any intention to kill him. I just wanted to do my work.\"", "Colonel\u00a0Thitisan, who was chief of the station in Nakhon Sawan province, north of Bangkok, disappeared shortly before the video surfaced on social media.", "The video shows the suspected drug dealer being led into a room in handcuffs, his head covered with a black plastic bag.", "He is then assaulted and thrown to the floor by officers who put more bags on his head. One of them appears to briefly kneel on him until he goes limp.", "", "
The leaked CCTV footage appears to show police officers placing a plastic bag over a man's head before he passes out.\u00a0(Supplied)
", "The video was posted by a well-known attorney, Decha Kittiwittayanan, who said he had received a complaint from a junior police officer in Nakhon Sawan.", "The complaint alleged that the police had demanded 1 million baht ($40,372) from the 24-year-old man who was killed and his female companion, who had been picked up with more than 100,000 methamphetamine tablets.", "After they agreed to pay, Colonel\u00a0Thitisan allegedly demanded double that amount and ordered his subordinates to cover the suspect's head with a plastic bag and beat him until he agreed.", "", "
Thitisan Utthanaphon was dating TV presenter Baitoey Pornpjee Sirisit whose father is a senior police officer in Thailand.\u00a0(Instagram:\u00a0Baitoey Pornpjee Sirisit)
", "When the suspect died, Colonel\u00a0Thitisan allegedly ordered his men to take the body to the hospital and tell the doctor the death was caused by a drug overdose.", "The junior police officer said the woman was released but told not to say anything about it, and Colonel\u00a0Thitisan paid the victim's father to remain silent.", "Investigators interrogated 35 witnesses as part of their investigation, police General\u00a0Suchart Teerasawat said.", "In addition, police and officials from Thailand's Anti-Money Laundering Office seized assets from Colonel\u00a0Thitisan worth about 131 million baht.", "They include a mansion valued at 57 million baht and 24 cars valued at 70 million baht, General Suchart said.", "Police are still investigating Colonel\u00a0Thitisan in a case involving the alleged improper seizure of illegally imported vehicles from Europe and other countries.", "AP"]
